Uses of Class
org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap.Rest2LDAP.Builder

  • Packages that use Rest2LDAP.Builder 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap
    APIs for implementing REST to LDAP gateways.

    • Uses of Rest2LDAP.Builder in org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap

      Methods in org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap that return Rest2LDAP.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.additionalLDAPAttribute(Attribute attribute)
      Specifies an additional LDAP attribute which should be included with new LDAP entries when they are created.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.additionalLDAPAttribute(String attribute, Object... values)
      Specifies an additional LDAP attribute which should be included with new LDAP entries when they are created.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.authorizationPolicy(AuthorizationPolicy policy)
      Sets the policy which should be for performing authorization.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.baseDN(DN dn)
      Sets the base DN beneath which LDAP entries (resources) are to be found.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.baseDN(String dn)
      Sets the base DN beneath which LDAP entries (resources) are to be found.
      static Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.builder()
      Returns a builder for incrementally constructing LDAP resource collections.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.configureMapping(org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue configuration)
      Configures the JSON to LDAP mapping using the provided JSON configuration.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.ldapConnectionFactory(ConnectionFactory factory)
      Sets the LDAP connection factory to be used for accessing the LDAP directory.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.mapper(AttributeMapper mapper)
      Sets the attribute mapper which should be used for mapping JSON resources to and from LDAP entries.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.proxyAuthzIdTemplate(String template)
      Sets the authorization ID template which will be used for proxied authorization.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.readOnUpdatePolicy(ReadOnUpdatePolicy policy)
      Sets the policy which should be used in order to read an entry before it is deleted, or after it is added or modified.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.schema(Schema schema)
      Sets the schema which should be used when attribute types and controls.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useClientDNNaming(AttributeType attribute)
      Indicates that the JSON resource ID must be provided by the user, and will be used for naming the associated LDAP entry.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useClientDNNaming(String attribute)
      Indicates that the JSON resource ID must be provided by the user, and will be used for naming the associated LDAP entry.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useClientNaming(AttributeType dnAttribute, AttributeDescription idAttribute)
      Indicates that the JSON resource ID must be provided by the user, but will not be used for naming the associated LDAP entry.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useClientNaming(String dnAttribute, String idAttribute)
      Indicates that the JSON resource ID must be provided by the user, but will not be used for naming the associated LDAP entry.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useEtagAttribute()
      Indicates that the "etag" LDAP attribute should be used for resource versioning.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useEtagAttribute(AttributeDescription attribute)
      Indicates that the provided LDAP attribute should be used for resource versioning.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useEtagAttribute(String attribute)
      Indicates that the provided LDAP attribute should be used for resource versioning.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.usePermissiveModify()
      Indicates that all LDAP modify operations should be performed using the LDAP permissive modify control.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useServerEntryUUIDNaming(AttributeType dnAttribute)
      Indicates that the JSON resource ID will be derived from the server provided "entryUUID" LDAP attribute.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useServerEntryUUIDNaming(String dnAttribute)
      Indicates that the JSON resource ID will be derived from the server provided "entryUUID" LDAP attribute.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useServerNaming(AttributeType dnAttribute, AttributeDescription idAttribute)
      Indicates that the JSON resource ID must not be provided by the user, and will not be used for naming the associated LDAP entry.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useServerNaming(String dnAttribute, String idAttribute)
      Indicates that the JSON resource ID must not be provided by the user, and will not be used for naming the associated LDAP entry.
      Rest2LDAP.Builder Rest2LDAP.Builder.useSubtreeDelete()
      Indicates that all LDAP delete operations should be performed using the LDAP subtree delete control.
